footer_up_paragraph: Established in 2020, Al-Buraq Mill quickly became a leading factory producing flour and bran with high quality and modern technologies.
footer_down_address: Minya Center, New Minya, Industrial Area, next to the Higher Institute of Systems & Information (EST)
index_hero_p: We offer the finest flour and bran with high quality and modern technologies
index_why_one_p: Using the latest rollers to ensure precise and consistent flour quality
index_why_two_p: Only the finest wheat varieties are inspected and chosen before production.
index_why_three_p: The mill has two grinding lines: the first with 12 cylinders / 24 grinding stages for high-volume production, and the second with 6 cylinders / 12 stages to ensure operational efficiency and production flexibility.
index_why_four_p: Continuous monitoring of protein and moisture to ensure each batch meets standards.
index_why_five_p: On-time delivery and logistical support for business partners.
index_sampleone: 72% extraction wheat flour, ideal for authentic French bread and pizza. The medium extraction rate gives a perfect balance between softness and nutritional value.
index_sampletwo: 100% natural coarse semolina made from the finest wheat. The base for all your oriental sweets, from honey desserts to basbousa and kunafa.
index_samplethree: Special wheat flour for pasta. High protein content ensures strong and elastic dough, perfect for homemade pasta that won't break when boiled.
index_samplefour: 72% extraction filo dough flour. The extraction rate provides a perfect balance between softness and nutritional value, ideal for pastries, pies, and kunafa.
index_quality_heading: Quality You Can Trust in Every Kilo
index_quality_paragraph: In our factory, quality is not just a stage; it’s a journey that starts with selecting the best wheat grains and continues until the final product reaches our customers. We adhere to the highest local and international standards to ensure that every kilo of flour leaving our facility carries the same nutritional value, purity, and safety.
index_quality_pone: Behind all these processes stands a team of skilled engineers and technicians specialized in grain technology and quality control, whose primary mission is to maintain your trust.
index_quality_ptwo: All this effort serves one goal: to provide you with reliable, consistent, and safe flour for baking products that stand out in taste, texture, and nutritional value. Our flour quality is the foundation of your product quality.
index_vision_paragraph: We commit to a comprehensive milling process that ensures the highest flour quality, with full control at every stage of production.
index_vision_boxone_p: Removing impurities, dust, and metals to ensure pure and safe raw materials.
index_vision_boxtwo_p: Adding water at precise ratios to improve milling efficiency and maintain bran quality.
index_vision_boxthree_p: Breaking wheat in carefully planned stages to efficiently separate the endosperm.
index_vision_boxfour_p: Separating flour and semolina using high-precision sieving systems.
index_vision_boxfive_p: Full control over flour fineness to achieve specification-compliant flour.
index_vision_boxsix_p: Flour is packed in a clean environment to maintain quality until delivery.
index_cta_h: Start Your Partnership with Al-Buraq Mill Today!
index_cta_p:
We offer high-quality flour with precise industrial specifications, with full commitment to quality and fast delivery.
Contact us today to get the best offers for your company.
about_main_h: Experience and Trust in Every Wheat Grain
about_main_p: Al-Buraq Mill is committed to providing high-quality flour that meets the needs of various food industries. With years of experience, we ensure precise milling and continuous quality monitoring of every batch.
about_mission_p: Providing high-quality flour with precise industrial standards to meet our business partners’ needs.
about_vision_p: To be the trusted supplier of flour in Egypt and the region, committed to innovation and quality at every stage.
about_power_one_p: Equipped with the latest milling machines with automated control and continuous monitoring using PLC and SCADA to minimize errors and ensure consistent product quality.
about_power_two_p: An integrated milling system ensuring balanced grinding and high homogeneity in flour for each production batch.
about_power_three_p: Complete flexibility in producing flour with different specifications suitable for bakeries and food factories.
about_power_four_p: Milling line with a total capacity of 350 tons/day with full readiness for future expansion.
about_cta_h: Looking for a Reliable Flour Supplier?
about_cta_p:
We provide high-quality flour with precise industrial specifications, with full commitment to quality and fast delivery.
Contact us today to get the best offers for your company.
contact_main_one_p: We are always at your service.
contact_main_two_p: Do not hesitate to reach out for any inquiry or supply request, and we will be happy to respond.
contact_address: Address:    Minya Center, New Minya, Industrial Area, next to the Higher Institute of Systems & Information (EST)
contact_form_h: Select products and quantities in bags
flouroneT: Used in pizza and French bread
flourtwoT: Used for Pies, Phyllo pastry, and kunafa
coarseT: Ideal for making bran bread also a basic feed
fineT: Ideal for light baked goods and toast bread
semolinaT: The king of oriental desserts: Basbousa, Harissa, and Maamoul
wheat_shortsT: Specially for making whole wheat toast and salted biscuits; a rich source of vitamins and minerals
form_end: ✔ Specifying quantities helps us provide a more accurate quote
jobs_heading_p: Join us and be part of our enthusiastic and innovative team. Whether you are a beginner or professional, we welcome you to contribute in an inspiring work environment.
product_p: We offer a wide range of products to meet the needs of bakeries and factories, from flour and bran to wheat shorts and semolina, under strict quality control.
quality_heading_p: We adhere to the highest quality standards to ensure a premium and safe product for every client.
quality_card_one_p: Using the latest milling and packing machines to ensure high quality with periodic maintenance and continuous calibration to maintain operational efficiency and performance consistency.
quality_card_two_p: To precisely monitor each production stage and achieve the highest levels of accuracy and reliability.
quality_card_three_p: Analyzing wheat samples before entering the factory and following up each product stage, performing necessary analyses, and checking each batch before packing to ensure highest quality standards.
quality_card_four_p: Trained technical staff applying quality systems within production lines and lab, ensuring consistent quality and product compliance.
quality_end_h: Would you like to request product samples?
quality_end_p: Contact us today and we will provide the best product samples for you.
